name: 8-Bit Alchemist
description:
RANDOMLY GENERATE WITH A SINGLE CLICK:

-16x16 sprites (heroes, townspeople, monsters)

-32x32 portraits (dark/ light)

Left click on the window to generate a new sprite. 

Right Click to copy and paste into your editor of choice.

THIS IS A WORK IN PROGRESS!!

I will be adding soon:

-actual sprite sheets (front/ back + walking side view)

-semi-random 8-bit colour schemes

-more art styles

-*I will try and work out something for bigger battle sprites!*
